data.title: Sela Urthing hydroelectric plant
data.meta_description: Sela Urthing hydroelectric plant is an announced hydroelectric power plant in Pithoragarh district, Uttarakhand, India.
data.text:
Part of the

Global Hydropower Tracker,

a Global Energy Monitor project.

Sela Urthing hydroelectric plant is an announced hydroelectric power plant in Pithoragarh district, Uttarakhand, India.

Project Details

Table 1: Project details for Sela Urthing hydroelectric plant

Status Nameplate capacity Turbines Technology type Owner Announced[1] 230 MW[2] 2 x 115 MW[2] Run-of-river[3] Uttarakhand Jal Vidyut Nigam LTD (UJVNL)[2]

Location

Table 2: Location details for Sela Urthing hydroelectric plant

Location River Coordinates (WGS 84) Pithoragarh district, Uttarakhand, India[2] Dhauliganga River[2] 30.1597, 80.6673 (approximate)[2]
